about_the_game:
This pack are totally cosmetic, and do not affect gameplay.
For those who are interested in further game updates and new content of Discordia.
It contains:

  • Unlock to spaceship rename feature
  • Seven color schemes for every spaceship to choose: Gorgonite Red, Canis Green, Shek'Snak Purple, Pirate Yellow, Mercenary Blue, United White, Honored Black

New customization features may be added to this pack in future.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2200mhz

short_description: This Supporter pack contains customization features, allowing you to change you fleet colors and spaceship names. There are six possible color schemes for every ship in game.
